comment.author: 38828133@N03
comment._content:
I love this photo.  The building structure layout is amazing.  I love how it is not too confined and trees are growing on top.  I love how it looks old, but not to old. The coloring and the fog gives it an extra oomph.  
Cheryl Excellent

Should be a postcard.

comment.author: 38828133@N03
comment._content:
Dear Swedish National Heritage Board,

I wanted to let you know that last night I showed my family all the pictures that I had commented to I had seen and they could not believe how amazing your pictures were.  My son especially loved the architecture of the buildings.  I cannot wait to see more. 

Cheryl

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Thank you all for your appreciation! :)

Dear Cheryl: Just hang on - more pics will soon be uploaded... Glad your family liked what we show here on The Commons. :)
/Anna B.
